list.label: Service
list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lxd" WITH KEY = "service"

list.label: Instance
list.name: instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "lxd" WITH KEY = "instance"

list.label: Container
list.name: container
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM lxd WITH key = "name"  WHERE "instance" = '$instance' AND "type" = 'container'
